title: Certificates of public convenience and necessity.
subject: Certificatesofpublicconvenienceandnecessity

abstracts.abstract:
Existing law prohibits gas corporations, electrical corporations, telegraph corporations, telephone corporations, water corporations, sewer system corporations, and certain railroad corporations from beginning construction of a street railroad, line, plant, or system without having first obtained from the Public Utilities Commission a certificate that the present or future public convenience and necessity requires or will require the construction, as specified.

This bill would make a nonsubstantive change to that provision.

actions.description: Introduced. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.

extras.impact_clause: An act to amend Section 1001 of the Public Utilities Code, relating to public utilities.
